name: part_003
file: tmp_【#雪花ラミィ生誕ライブ】ゲストいっぱい！誕生日LIVE【雪花ラミィ⧸ホロライブ】 [hEkHj1WZekU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: MC section where the group celebrates Lamy's birthday and takes a commemorative photo.
Introduction of Tokoyami Towa and performance of 'Ikenai Borderline'.

subtitles.original: JOY!
subtitles.english: JOY!

subtitles.original: ラミィちゃん、おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Lamy-chan, congratulations!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: （笑い声）
subtitles.english: (Laughter)

subtitles.original: おめでとうだね。
subtitles.english: Congratulations.

subtitles.original: 頑張った、頑張った。
subtitles.english: We did it, we did it.

subtitles.original: みんな、みんな頑張ったー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, everyone did their best!

subtitles.original: ということで。
subtitles.english: And so.

subtitles.original: 「じょいふる」、OKBRのメンバーで歌わせていただきましたー！
subtitles.english: We performed 'JOYFUL' as the members of OKBR!

subtitles.original: よし、じゃあ撮るかー！
subtitles.english: Alright, let's take a photo!

subtitles.original: 待って、待って、待って！お疲れ全開のラミィ待って。
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, wait! Hold on, Lamy, you're exhausted.

subtitles.original: まだ、まだ、まだ。待って！
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, not yet. Just wait!

subtitles.original: 何、何やりたいの？
subtitles.english: What, what do you want to do?

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って、まずは深呼吸させて……。
subtitles.english: Wait a second, let me catch my breath first...

subtitles.original: えーということで。
subtitles.english: Alright, so.

subtitles.original: 本日ラミィ、実は今日誕生日なので。
subtitles.english: Since today is actually Lamy's birthday.

subtitles.original: そうね、おめでとう！とんでもない事実、そう、おめでとうございます。
subtitles.english: That's right, happy birthday! An incredible fact, yes, congratulations.

subtitles.original: なのでね、ちょっとやっぱり記念に、この汗だく記念に写真を撮りたいなと。
subtitles.english: So, to commemorate this, this sweaty moment, I'd like to take a photo.

subtitles.original: どういうポーズで撮りたい？
subtitles.english: What kind of pose do you want to do?

subtitles.original: あ、でもこれほら、せっかく今、後ろにキッズもみんな良い感じにいるから。
subtitles.english: Ah, but look, the kids in the back are all lined up nicely right now.

subtitles.original: これでやってみようか。
subtitles.english: Let's try doing it like this.

subtitles.original: この辺から？こう？
subtitles.english: From around here? Like this?

subtitles.original: あ、良いんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Oh, that's good!

subtitles.original: もうちょい近い方が良い？
subtitles.english: Should we be a bit closer?

subtitles.original: どうだ？良い感じ、良い感じ。
subtitles.english: How's that? It looks good, looks good.

subtitles.original: 良い感じ？良いねー。
subtitles.english: Looking good? Nice.

subtitles.original: よし、変える、変える！待って、待って！
subtitles.english: Alright, changing, changing! Wait, wait!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、あと一個だけ！あと一個だけ！
subtitles.english: Okay, just one more! Just one more!

subtitles.original: あれやろうかな、これよ！
subtitles.english: Maybe I'll do that, this one!

subtitles.original: あれな、中中なんたら。
subtitles.english: That Chu-chu thingy.

subtitles.original: 良いよ、良い？
subtitles.english: Sure, okay?

subtitles.original: じゃあラミィの掛け声で、我々は出発するでな！
subtitles.english: Then, on my cue, we'll head out!

subtitles.original: えーじゃあ何で？OKBRで行こうか、OK？
subtitles.english: Alright, then what should we say? Let's go with OKBR, okay?

subtitles.original: 本当に行くよ、OKBRーー！！
subtitles.english: I'm really doing it, OKBRRR!!

subtitles.original: ママ、何あれ、見ちゃいけません。
subtitles.english: Mama, what was that? You shouldn't look.

subtitles.original: ……夢落ち？
subtitles.english: ...Was it a dream?

subtitles.original: 常闇トワ先輩に来てもらいましたー！
subtitles.english: Tokoyami Towa-senpai has joined us!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！そして、ラミィお誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you! And, Lamy, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: それじゃあみんな盛り上がっていくぞー！
subtitles.english: Now then, everyone, let's get hyped!

subtitles.original: いけないボーダーライン
subtitles.english: Ikenai Borderline

subtitles.original: 見つめ合って 恋をして
subtitles.english: Gazing at each other, falling in love

subtitles.original: 無我夢中で 追いかけて
subtitles.english: Chasing frantically

subtitles.original: だけど もっと 知りたくて メラメラしてる
subtitles.english: But wanting to know more, I'm burning up

subtitles.original: 願うほど 謎が増え
subtitles.english: The more I wish, the more mysteries increase

subtitles.original: 思うほど 熱になる
subtitles.english: The more I think, the hotter I get

subtitles.original: だから もっと 飛び込むの 未開の世界
subtitles.english: So I'll dive further into the unexplored world

subtitles.original: 恋とか夢とか誰でも信じるけど
subtitles.english: Anyone would believe in things like love or dreams

subtitles.original: そこそこ攻めなきゃつまんないよ
subtitles.english: But it's boring unless you take some risks

subtitles.original: ギリギリ愛 いけないボーダーライン
subtitles.english: Love on the edge, the forbidden borderline

subtitles.original: 難易度Gでも 全て壊してみせる
subtitles.english: Even if it's Rank G difficulty, I'll break through it all

subtitles.original: ギリギリ舞 さらなるGへと
subtitles.english: Dancing on the edge, towards an even higher G

subtitles.original: 意識が溶ける 体は制御不能
subtitles.english: Consciousness melts, my body is out of control

subtitles.original: いっちゃうかもね
subtitles.english: I might just let go

subtitles.original: ふざけあった友達と
subtitles.english: With the friends I joked around with

subtitles.original: 求めあったあの人と
subtitles.english: With the person I longed for

subtitles.original: また会える日のために ギラギラしてる
subtitles.english: I'm shining bright for the day we meet again

subtitles.original: 光るほど 影はでき
subtitles.english: The brighter the light, the darker the shadow

subtitles.original: 燃えるほど 灰になる
subtitles.english: The more I burn, the more I turn to ash

subtitles.original: 走るほど 見えてくる 危ないライン
subtitles.english: The more I run, the more the dangerous line appears
